description: File Number: W8486-249300/Aviso de Proyecto de Mercade
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Government Tender Information

| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| **Tender Number** | W8486-249300/A  |
| **Reference Number** | cb-900-82835460  |
| **Amendment Number** | 5  |
| **Solicitation Number** | W8486-249300/A  |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-10-16  |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-11-27T14:00:00 |
| **Region(s) of Opportunity** | Worldwide  |
| **Region(s) of Delivery** | Alberta, Quebec (except NCR) |
| **Procurement Category** | Goods and Services |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open bidding |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal |
| **Selection Criteria** | Lowest Price |
| **Languages of Business** | English and French |

## Tender Details

The Department of National Defence is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of spare parts. The scope of the requirement includes the following UNSPSC codes:

* Miscellaneous fasteners
* Metal nets and screening structures
* Liquid gaskets
* Distribution and control centers and accessories
* Industrial filtering and purification
* Iron tubes
* Chassis components

The tender closing date is 2023-11-27 at 14:00:00. Late bids will not be accepted. 

The tender specification includes detailed requirements and price sections, which can be accessed using the following links:

- [English version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22334/w8486-249300a---rfp---spare-parts-%28en.pdf)
- [French version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22334/w8486-249300a---rfp---spare-parts-%28fr.pdf)

## Contact Information

For any inquiries related to this tender, please contact:

Dylan deRepentigny
[hdccelement](mailto:Dylan.derepentigny@forces.gc.ca)
(000) 000-0000

## Terms and Conditions

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents can be submitted in either English or French.
* Bids must be submitted by e-mail only to the contact information provided above.
